.. _widget-scale-label:

========================
 Scale
========================

Add a OpenLayers Scale control to the map.


XML Sample
------------
Sample configuration

.. code-block:: xml

   <scale>
     <name>W_MyScale</name>
     <options>
     </options>
   </scale>

N/A
